Title: Speed Racer
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Sci-Fi, Sport
Writer: Lilly Wachowski, Lana Wachowski, Tatsuo Yoshida (animated series "Speed Racer")
Actors: Emile Hirsch, Nicholas Elia, Susan Sarandon, Melissa Holroyd
Plot: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.
